bibl.title: Counting the Greeks in Egypt. Immigration in the First Century of Ptolemaic Rule.
bibl.note: Introduction. - First method (Raphia). - Second method (Macedonians). - Third method (katoikoi hippeis), in the second century BC. - Fourth method (extrapolation from the Fayyum). - Conclusion.

bibl.title: Demography and the Graeco-Roman World. New Insights and Approaches.

bibl.seg: Fischer-Bovet Christelle, Counting the Greeks in Egypt. Immigration in the First Century of Ptolemaic Rule.
Claire Holleran and April Pudsey (Edd.), Demography and the Graeco-Roman World. New Insights and Approaches (Cambridge, 2011) pp. 135-154, 7 tabl.
Introduction. - First method (Raphia). - Second method (Macedonians). - Third method (katoikoi hippeis), in the second century BC. - Fourth method (extrapolation from the Fayyum). - Conclusion.
